response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which I believe would significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. Given its value to you, I estimate its worth to be around $15,000. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects its true value but also allows us to maintain a fair transaction. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and contribute to your business's growth.", "product_price": 12000}
